content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 26, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 41, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a wooden sword, I need to place two planks on top of each other, with a stick below them. Therefore, I will move the dark oak wood from slot 10 to the crafting grid, starting at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 26, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 41, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 44}]
thought: After placing the dark oak wood in the crafting grid, I can craft 4 dark oak planks. I will move these planks to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 26, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 41, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a wooden sword I need 2 dark oak planks and a stick. I have 4 dark oak planks in my inventory at slot 11 and a stick at slot 42. Therefore, I will first move 1 plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 26, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 41, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 44}]
thought: I need 2 dark oak planks, so I will move another one from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 26, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 41, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have the two planks in place, I need to add the stick. The stick is at slot 42, so I will move it to slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 26, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 41, "index": 31}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 44}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
